contentrichtext.text: '''Bloomington''' is the name of some places in the United States of America: *[[Bloomington, California]] *[[Bloomington, Idaho]] *[[Bloomington, Illinois]] ** the Bloomington meteorite of 1938, which fell in Illinois, United States (see [[Meteorite falls]]) *[[Bloomington, Indiana]] *[[Bloomington, Maryland]] *[[Bloomington, Minnesota]] ** the largest city with the name "Bloomington." *[[Bloomington, Missouri]] *[[Bloomington, Nebraska]] *[[Bloomington, Texas]] *[[Bloomington, Utah]] *[[Bloomington (Louisa, Virginia)]], [[List of RHPs in VA|listed on the NRHP in Virginia]] *[[Bloomington, Wisconsin]] *[[Bloomington (town), Wisconsin]] *[[Bloomington Township, McLean County, Illinois]] *[[Bloomington Township, Indiana]] *[[Bloomington Township, Decatur County, Iowa]] *[[Bloomington Township, Muscatine County, Iowa]] *[[Bloomington Township, Kansas]] *[[Bloomington Township, Minnesota]] *[[Bloomington Township, Missouri]] *[[New Bloomington, Ohio]] and in Canada: *[[Bloomington, Stormont-Dundas-Glengarry, Ontario]] *[[Bloomington, York Region, Ontario]] *[[Bloomington, Nova Scotia]] == Other == * [[Bloomington (film)|''Bloomington'' (film)]], a 2010 film {{disambiguation}} [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]]
